Drafted in 7th round, 126th overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1975...

Released by Chicago (N) on 8/22/1983...
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1985...
Traded from Cincinnati to Los Angeles on 2/10/1985 (Going to LA: P J. Wetteland, P T. Crews, C T. Munson, P S. Rogers. Going to CIN: 3B J. Mumphrey, DH K. Moreland, LF B. Downing)...
